price: څه (خلك) چې په اسمانو او ځمكه كې دي، ټول رحمن ته د بنده په توګه ورتلونكي دي.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
